title: A Justified Vindication
description: A Different Kind of Book 2 A fledging Faery and a vengeful Witch meet at school and become friendsâ€¦ The Supernatural Realm is aware that Maseke's child is a Wailer Witch. Boke's life is in danger. There are many Avalon and Witch families out for revenge for past atrocities committed by the Maiga family. But Boke, the last Maiga, is on her own war path for retribution.
author: Carol A. Robi
